channel.title: Help with smithing
channel.description: k im tryin to make a whole new smithing thing with silver bars...using testscape source and i copy and pasted rare smithing and "tried" to edit that.. it screwed up my iron and gilded smithing and when i try to smith the stuff i put in to be able to smith it just disconnects me, any help? plz

item.description:

item.title: Help with smithing
item.dc:creator: @anything anything
item.description:
@anything wrote:

i have 7 backups so…it doesn’t matter…im just wonderin how to change what u can smith…

P.S a tut might help (if someone would make one i bet lots of newbs (or noobs…) would like it…)

Read full topic

item.title: Help with smithing
item.dc:creator: @bloodbath32 bloodbath32
item.description:
@bloodbath32 wrote:

Don’t add barrows smithing until you’re a better coder? Because you obviously fucked up your client. And, if you didn’t, then next time maybe consider ‘Backing Up’.

Read full topic
